created.description: ISO-8601 timestamp with zone for when this document was first created.

updated.description: ISO-8601 timestamp with zone for when this document was most recently updated.

mimetype.description: Mimetype corresponding to the enclosed photo type. This can be different from the mimetype cited in the superschema, especially in the case of mixed type photo albums.

content.description: Depending on the `encoding`, this will be either a URL pointing to an externally-hosted image, or a base64-encoded image binary.

meta.description: Additional metadata to provide along with the document.
